poem:
### Wireless Wonder

In the hum of the air,  
voices trace electric threads—  
crackling hearths  
invite the unseen stars,  
unfurl whispered dreams   
as sound waves sway  
in rooms once silent,  
where now echoes  
of distant souls   
bind the lonely dusk  
with shared breath.  
A revolution spun  
in static whispers—  
a singular harmony,  
alive in every home.
